metadata.description: The legendary warrior of medieval Spain whose battles were a precursor for the upcoming Crusades in Europe and the Middle East are depicted. In this chronicle, the life of El Cid is explored as he spends his life bringing together both Moor and Christian into a unified Spain. Banished from his own Kingdom, the ‘Cid’ continues to fight, at various times on the side of both Muslim and Christian to bring a nation into being. Amazing painted full color images by acclaimed noted artist Wayne Reid.
metadata.name: El Cid: The Conqueror
